EmailTemplate.description: Use to provide Quote Status Update for Portal Spares Quoting (System)
EmailTemplate.name: Quote Status Update for Portal Spares Quoting
EmailTemplate.subject: Updated Quote Status: CASE Number {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Updated Quote Status Information Only – No Action required
You have new items to review in Quote Status for CASE: {!Case.CaseNumber}.
Note
This email is being sent from unmonitored mailbox. If you need further assistance, please contact a customer support team member at:
1-800-601-3099 For US / Canada (Toll Free) 1-602-365-3099 International
Thank You, Honeywell Aerospace Customer Support Team
CONTACT US
